description.english: Complete a playthrough without using any items
description.german: Einen Spieldurchlauf abschließen, ohne Gegenstände einzusetzen.
description.french: Terminez une partie sans utiliser d'objets.
description.italian: Completa una partita intera senza usare oggetti.
description.spanish: Completa una partida sin usar objetos.
description.schinese: 在不用任何物品的情况下完成一局
description.tchinese: 不使用任何物品就通關
description.russian: Пройдите игру, ни разу не использовав предметы.

description.english: Parry a God 5 times without taking a hit
description.german: 5 Angriffe eines Gottes abwehren, ohne einen Treffer einzustecken.
description.french: Effectuez 5 parades contre une divinité sans vous faire toucher.
description.italian: Esegui 5 parate contro una divinità senza subire colpi.
description.spanish: Hazle un quite a una deidad 5 veces sin recibir ni un golpe.
description.schinese: 在不被击中的情况下招架一位神明5次
description.tchinese: 格擋一尊神 5 次而不被擊中
description.russian: Парируйте атаку божества 5 раз, не пропустив ни одного удара по себе.

description.english: Kill all the gods and win freedom for humankind
description.german: Alle Götter besiegen und die Menschheit befreien.
description.french: Tuez toutes les divinités et libérez l'humanité.
description.italian: Uccidi tutte le divinità e libera l'umanità.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los dioses y consigue liberar a la humanidad.
description.schinese: 杀死所有神明，为人类赢得自由
description.tchinese: 殺光所有尊神，贏來人類的自由
description.russian: Убейте всех богов и завоюйте свободу человечеству.

description.english: Kill a god with your very first warrior attempt
description.german: Einen Gott bei deinem ersten Kriegerversuch töten.
description.french: Terrassez une divinité à la première tentative.
description.italian: Uccidi una divinità nel tuo primo tentativo in assoluto.
description.spanish: Mata a una deidad en tu primer intento con un guerrero.
description.schinese: 首次出动战士杀死一位神明
description.tchinese: 用最初的勇士挑戰就殺死一尊神
description.russian: Убейте бога первым воителем с первой попытки.

displayName.spanish: Con medio pie en la tumba

description.english: Defeat a god with only a single pip of vigour remaining
description.german: Einen Gott besiegen, wenn du nur noch einen Punkt Lebenskraft übrig hast.
description.french: Terrassez une divinité avec un seul point de vigueur restant.
description.italian: Uccidi una divinità con una sola unità di Vigore restante.
description.spanish: Derrota a una deidad cuando solo te quede un segmento de vigor.
description.schinese: 在仅剩一点体力的情况下击败一位神明
description.tchinese: 在體力只剩一滴的情況下打倒一尊神
description.russian: Сразите бога, имея лишь одну единицу рвения.

description.english: Beat a god without taking a single hit of damage during the fight
description.german: Einen Gott besiegen, ohne im Kampf auch nur einen Treffer einzustecken, der Schaden verursacht.
description.french: Terrassez une divinité sans vous faire toucher pendant le combat.
description.italian: Sconfiggi una divinità senza subire danni durante lo scontro.
description.spanish: Derrota a una deidad sin recibir daño alguno durante el combate.
description.schinese: 在战斗中未受到任何伤害的情况下击败一位神明
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥過程中不受任何傷害就打倒一尊神
description.russian: Победите бога, не получив урона в бою.

description.english: Throw three vassals from the raft in the sea domain
description.german: Im Meeresreich drei Vasallen vom Floß werfen.
description.french: Jetez trois vassaux du radeau dans le domaine de la Mer.
description.italian: Lancia tre vassalli dalla zattera nel dominio del mare.
description.spanish: Arroja a tres vasallos desde la balsa en el dominio del mar.
description.schinese: 在海洋境域中，将三名仆从扔下筏子
description.tchinese: 在海洋神域把三名僕從扔下木筏
description.russian: Сбросьте трёх слуг с плота в морских владениях.

description.english: Survive the elevator section, untouched using only parries and throws
description.german: Den Aufzugabschnitt unversehrt überleben und dabei nur Abwehr und Würfe einsetzen.
description.french: Survivez à l'ascenseur sans vous faire toucher et en n'utilisant que des parades et des projections.
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla sezione dell'ascensore senza subire danni e utilizzando solo parate e lanci.
description.spanish: Sobrevive al ascensor sin recibir daño y usando solo quites y lanzamientos.
description.schinese: 在升降机区域，仅用招架和摔掷存活下来，不受任何伤害
description.tchinese: 在升降段落中，只使用格擋與投擲全程不被擊中
description.russian: Используя только парирования и броски, пройдите сегмент с подъёмником, не получив урона.

description.english: Toss 10 enemies into the surrounding abyss in any single dungeon visit
description.german: Bei einem Aufenthalt in einem Verlies 10 Gegner in den umliegenden Abgrund werfen.
description.french: Jetez 10 ennemis dans les abîmes de n'importe quel donjon.
description.italian: Lancia 10 nemici giù da un precipizio durante una singola visita a un dungeon.
description.spanish: Arroja a 10 enemigos al abismo que te rodea en una única visita a una mazmorra.
description.schinese: 在任意一次攻打地下城的战斗中，将10名敌人扔进附近的深渊
description.tchinese: 單次進入秘境期間，把 10 名敵人扔進周圍的深淵中
description.russian: За время прохождения одного подземелья бросьте десять врагов в бездну.

displayName.spanish: Se mira, pero no se toca

description.english: Deliver 25 points of damage without taking a single hit
description.german: Schaden in Höhe von 25 Punkten verursachen, ohne einen Treffer einzustecken.
description.french: Infligez 25 points de dégâts sans vous faire toucher.
description.italian: Infliggi 25 punti danno senza subire colpi.
description.spanish: Inflige 25 puntos de daño sin recibir un solo golpe.
description.schinese: 在不被敌人击中的情况下造成25点伤害
description.tchinese: 造成 25 點傷害而不被擊中
description.russian: Нанесите 25 единиц урона, не пропустив ни одного удара по себе.

description.english: Deliver 50 points of damage without taking a single hit
description.german: Schaden in Höhe von 50 Punkten verursachen, ohne einen Treffer einzustecken.
description.french: Infligez 50 points de dégâts sans vous faire toucher.
description.italian: Infliggi 50 punti danno senza subire colpi.
description.spanish: Inflige 50 puntos de daño sin recibir un solo golpe.
description.schinese: 在不被敌人击中的情况下造成50点伤害
description.tchinese: 造成 50 點傷害而不被擊中
description.russian: Нанесите 50 единиц урона, не пропустив ни одного удара по себе.

description.english: Kill an enemy with a thrown weapon, while airborne
description.german: Einen Gegner aus dem Sprung mit einer Wurfwaffe töten.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi avec une arme de jet lorsque vous êtes en l'air.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con un'arma da lancio mentre sei in aria.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con un arma arrojadiza mientras estés en el aire.
description.schinese: 在空中时，用投掷武器杀死敌人
description.tchinese: 在空中使用投擲武器殺死一名敵人
description.russian: Находясь в воздухе, убейте врага метательным оружием.

description.english: Kill three enemies with the same melee attack
description.german: Drei Gegner mit demselben Nahkampfangriff töten.
description.french: Tuez trois ennemis d'une seule attaque de mêlée.
description.italian: Uccidi tre nemici con lo stesso attacco corpo a corpo.
description.spanish: Mata a tres enemigos con el mismo ataque cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 用相同的近战攻击杀死三名敌人
description.tchinese: 使用相同的近戰攻擊殺死三名敵人
description.russian: Убейте трёх врагов одной атакой ближнего боя.

description.english: Clear the tutorial
description.german: Das Tutorial abschließen.
description.french: Terminez le didacticiel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.
description.schinese: 打通教程
description.tchinese: 通過教學
description.russian: Пройдите обучение.

description.english: Perform a Tier 3 Roar
description.german: Einen Schrei der Stufe 3 ausstoßen.
description.french: Poussez un hurlement de niveau 3.
description.italian: Esegui un Ruggito di livello 3.
description.spanish: Realiza un rugido de nivel 3.
description.schinese: 施展3级战吼
description.tchinese: 使出 3 階戰吼
description.russian: Испустите рёв 3-го уровня.

description.english: Throw an enemy off an edge, to their death
description.german: Einen Gegner von einem Hang in den Tod stürzen.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi en le poussant dans un précipice.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico lanciandolo giù da un precipizio.
description.spanish: Lanza un enemigo por un precipicio para matarlo.
description.schinese: 将敌人从高处边沿摔掷击杀
description.tchinese: 投擲敵人使其從崖邊摔落而死
description.russian: Убейте врага, сбросив его с утёса.

description.english: Trade with the Barrow Hag
description.german: Mit der Grabhügelhexe handeln.
description.french: Faites affaire avec la sorcière des tertres.
description.italian: Fai uno scambio con la Megera del tumulo.
description.spanish: Comercia con la bruja del túmulo.
description.schinese: 和坟冢巫婆进行交易
description.tchinese: 與古墳巫婆交易
description.russian: Заключите сделку с Ведьмой кургана.

description.english: Retrieve an item from the old well
description.german: Einen Gegenstand aus dem alten Brunnen ziehen.
description.french: Récupérez un objet dans le puits ancestral.
description.italian: Recupera un oggetto dal vecchio pozzo.
description.spanish: Recupera un objeto del viejo pozo.
description.schinese: 从古井当中获得一件物品
description.tchinese: 從老水井中取回物品
description.russian: Достаньте предмет из древнего колодца.

description.english: Lose a warrior to a deadly attack
description.german: Einen Krieger durch einen tödlichen Angriff verlieren.
description.french: Perdez un guerrier lors d'une attaque mortelle.
description.italian: Perdi un guerriero a causa di un attacco mortale.
description.spanish: Pierde a un guerrero por un ataque letal.
description.schinese: 因致命攻击而失去一名战士
description.tchinese: 一名勇士因為致命攻擊而死
description.russian: Потеряйте воителя в смертоносной атаке.

description.english: Defeat a god
description.german: Einen Gott besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez une divinité.
description.italian: Sconfiggi una divinità.
description.spanish: Derrota a una deidad.
description.schinese: 击败一位神明
description.tchinese: 打倒一尊神
description.russian: Сразите божество.

description.english: Escape the Gutter in the Devourer’s domain
description.german: Aus der Rinne im Reich des Verschlingers entkommen.
description.french: Échappez-vous du chenal dans le domaine de la Dévoration.
description.italian: Scappa dallo Scolo nel dominio della Voracità.
description.spanish: Escapa del Fondo en el dominio de la Devoradora.
description.schinese: 逃出吞噬者境域中的沟地
description.tchinese: 逃出吞噬者神域的羊腸溝
description.russian: Сбегите из Канавы во владениях Пожирателя.

description.english: Kill an enemy using an environmental hazard
description.german: Einen Gegner mithilfe der Spielumgebung töten.
description.french: Terrassez un ennemi à l'aide d'un aléa naturel.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico usando un elemento interattivo.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo gracias a un peligro del entorno.
description.schinese: 用环境危险障碍物杀死敌人
description.tchinese: 利用環境中的危險物殺死一名敵人
description.russian: Убейте врага с помощью окружения.

description.english: Defeat Methir-Shirraidh
description.german: Methir-Shirraidh besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Methir-Shirraidh.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Methir-Shirraidh.
description.spanish: Derrota a Methir-Shirraidh.
description.schinese: 击败摩提尔西莱德
description.tchinese: 打倒梅希爾施萊德
description.russian: Победите Метир Ширру.

description.english: Defeat Osseus
description.german: Osseus besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Osseus.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Osseus.
description.spanish: Derrota a Osseus.
description.schinese: 击败奥塞斯
description.tchinese: 打倒奧塞斯
description.russian: Победите Оссия.

description.english: Defeat Breith-Dorcha
description.german: Breith-Dorcha besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Breith-Dorcha.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Breith-Dorcha.
description.spanish: Derrota a Breith-Dorcha.
description.schinese: 击败布列朵赫
description.tchinese: 打倒布烈朵赫
description.russian: Победите Бре Дорху.

description.english: Defeat Ogmios
description.german: Ogmios besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Ogmios.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Ogmios.
description.spanish: Derrota a Ogmios.
description.schinese: 击败奥格缪斯
description.tchinese: 打倒奧格米歐斯
description.russian: Победите Огмия.

description.english: Defeat Carnoccus
description.german: Carnoccus besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Carnoccus.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Carnoccus.
description.spanish: Derrota a Carnoccus.
description.schinese: 击败卡诺克斯
description.tchinese: 打倒卡諾克斯
description.russian: Победите Карноцция.

description.english: Defeat Krannus
description.german: Krannus besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Krannus.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Krannus.
description.spanish: Derrota a Krannus.
description.schinese: 击败克兰努斯
description.tchinese: 打倒克蘭努斯
description.russian: Победите Кранния.

description.english: Defeat Lochlannarg
description.german: Lochlannarg besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Lochlannarg.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Lochlannarg.
description.spanish: Derrota a Lochlannarg.
description.schinese: 击败洛赫兰纳格
description.tchinese: 打倒洛赫蘭納格
description.russian: Победите Лохланнарга.

description.english: Defeat Boadannu
description.german: Boadannu besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Boadannu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Boadannu.
description.spanish: Derrota a Boadannu.
description.schinese: 击败波达奴
description.tchinese: 打倒波達努
description.russian: Победите Боаданну.

description.english: Defeat Morrigan
description.german: Morrigan besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Morrigan.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Morrigan.
description.spanish: Derrota a Morrigan.
description.schinese: 击败茉莉安
description.tchinese: 打倒摩莉甘
description.russian: Победите Морриган.

description.english: Defeat Belenos
description.german: Belenos besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Bélénos.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Belenos.
description.spanish: Derrota a Belenos.
description.schinese: 击败百勒努斯
description.tchinese: 打倒貝里努斯
description.russian: Победите Беления.

description.english: Kill Methir-Shirraidh with her own arrow
description.german: Methir-Shirraidh mit ihrem eigenen Pfeil töten.
description.french: Terrassez Methir-Shirraidh avec sa propre flèche.
description.italian: Uccidi Methir-Shirraidh con la sua stessa freccia.
description.spanish: Mata a Methir-Shirraidh con su propia flecha.
description.schinese: 用摩提尔西莱德自己的箭杀死她
description.tchinese: 讓梅希爾施萊德死於自己的箭矢
description.russian: Убейте Метир Ширру её собственной стрелой.

description.english: Defeat Osseus while he is on his back
description.german: Osseus besiegen, während er auf dem Rücken liegt.
description.french: Terrassez Osseus lorsqu'il est sur le dos.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Osseus quando è supino.
description.spanish: Derrota a Osseus mientras esté boca arriba.
description.schinese: 在奥塞斯仰面朝天的情况下击败他
description.tchinese: 在奧塞斯躺下時打倒祂
description.russian: Убейте Оссия, пока он лежит на спине.

description.english: Defeat Breith-Dorcha with a single pip of vigour remaining
description.german: Breith-Dorcha besiegen, wenn du nur noch einen Punkt Lebenskraft übrig hast.
description.french: Terrassez Breith-Dorcha avec un seul point de vigueur restant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Breith-Dorcha con una sola unità di Vigore restante.
description.spanish: Derrota a Breith-Dorcha cuando te quede un solo segmento de vigor.
description.schinese: 在仅剩一点体力的情况下击败布列朵赫
description.tchinese: 在體力只剩一滴的情況下打倒布烈朵赫
description.russian: Победите Бре Дорху, когда у вас будет оставаться всего одна единица рвения.

description.english: Defeat Ogmios after journeying through the Gutter
description.german: Ogmios besiegen, nachdem du die Rinne durchquert hast.
description.french: Terrassez Ogmios après avoir traversé le chenal.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Ogmios dopo aver attraversato lo Scolo.
description.spanish: Derrota a Ogmios después de recorrer el Fondo.
description.schinese: 在穿过沟地后击败奥格缪斯
description.tchinese: 走過一趟羊腸溝後打倒奧格米歐斯
description.russian: Победите Огмия, пройдя сквозь Канаву.

description.english: Defeat Carnoccus without destroying any totems
description.german: Carnoccus besiegen, ohne Totems zu zerstören.
description.french: Terrassez Carnoccus sans détruire un seul totem.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Carnoccus senza distruggere alcun totem.
description.spanish: Derrota a Carnoccus sin destruir ningún tótem.
description.schinese: 在不摧毁任何图腾的情况下击败卡诺克斯
description.tchinese: 在不破壞任何圖騰的情況下打倒卡諾克斯
description.russian: Победите Карноцция, не уничтожив ни одного тотема.

description.english: Defeat Krannus’ guards within 5 seconds of each other
description.german: Krannus’ Wachen in Abständen von höchstens 5 Sekunden besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez les gardes de Krannus à la suite en moins de 5 secondes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi le guardie di Krannus entro 5 secondi l'una dall'altra.
description.spanish: Derrota a los guardias de Krannus sin dejar que pasen más de 5 s entre cada muerte.
description.schinese: 击败克兰努斯的守卫，间隔不超过5秒
description.tchinese: 連續打倒克蘭努斯的兩名護衛，相隔不超過 5 秒
description.russian: Одолейте второго стража Кранния в течение 5 секунд после победы над первым.

description.english: Defeat Lochlannarg without ever being struck by his lightning
description.german: Lochlannarg besiegen, ohne von seinem Blitz getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Terrassez Lochlannarg sans vous faire toucher par son éclair.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Lochlannarg senza essere colpito dai suoi fulmini.
description.spanish: Derrota a Lochlannarg sin que te alcancen sus rayos ni una vez.
description.schinese: 在不被洛赫兰纳格的闪电击中的情况下击败他
description.tchinese: 在未曾被洛赫蘭納格的閃電擊中的情況下打倒祂
description.russian: Победите Лохланнарга, ни разу не попав под удар его молнии.

description.english: Kill Boadannu without killing any vassals during the fight with her
description.german: Boadannu töten, ohne während des Kampfes gegen sie Vasallen zu töten.
description.french: Terrassez Boadannu sans tuer un seul vassal pendant le combat.
description.italian: Uccidi Boadannu senza uccidere alcun vassallo durante lo scontro con lei.
description.spanish: Mata a Boadannu sin matar a ningún vasallo durante el combate.
description.schinese: 与波达奴战斗时，在不杀死任何仆从的情况下杀死她
description.tchinese: 殺死波達努時在戰鬥期間沒有殺掉任何僕從
description.russian: Убейте Боаданну, не убив ни одного из слуг во время сражения.

description.english: Defeat Morrigan with a Tier 5 weapon
description.german: Morrigan mit einer Waffe der Stufe 5 besiegen.
description.french: Terrassez Morrigan avec une arme de niveau 5.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Morrigan con un'arma di livello 5.
description.spanish: Derrota a Morrigan con un arma de nivel 5.
description.schinese: 用5级武器击败茉莉安
description.tchinese: 使用 5 階武器打倒摩莉甘
description.russian: Победите Морриган оружием 5-го уровня.

description.english: Defeat Belenos without being hit by his Radiant Sunlight attack
description.german: Belenos besiegen, ohne von seiner Fähigkeit „Sonnenstrahl“ getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Terrassez Bélénos sans vous faire toucher par son attaque Rayon solaire.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Belenos senza essere colpito dal suo attacco Sole radioso.
description.spanish: Derrota a Belenos sin que te alcance su ataque Sol radiante.
description.schinese: 在不被炎阳攻击击中的情况下击败百勒努斯
description.tchinese: 在沒有被貝里努斯的陽光烈焰攻擊打中的情況下打倒祂
description.russian: Победите Беления, ни разу не попав под его атаку солнечным лучом.
